scripts.build:workspace: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.main.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=prod $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) --gc --minify
scripts.build:workspace:devel: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.devel.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=devel $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) --gc
scripts.build:workspace:stage: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.stage.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=stage $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) --gc
scripts.devel: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.devel.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=devel $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) server --port=1313 --disableFastRender
scripts.mod-pack:devel: HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.devel.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=devel $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) mod npm pack
scripts.prod: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.main.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=prod $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) server --port=1315 --disableFastRender
scripts.rebuild:workspace: npm run clean && npm run build:workspace
scripts.stage: dotenvx run -- env HUGO_MODULE_WORKSPACE=go.stage.work HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=stage $(hvm status --printExecPathCached) server --port=1314 --disableFastRender
